just reading through this old post, and since then i have actually gotten a lvl 87 miner banned… not going to kill myself though.

item.title: Falidor Drinks Buyer
item.dc:creator: @Do0mz Do0mz
item.description:
@Do0mz wrote:

This took me about 4 hours to make becuase i couldnt find the command to get it to click a color. Its for buying any drink at the falidor bar which help’s me a ton since im a f2p rune miner. I hope it helps some other people aswell :rolleyes:

PS: yes this is my first script for Runescape.

[code]{Created By Do0mz}
{This script will buy dwarven stouts from Kaylee at the bar in falidor
It can also buy other drinks}

program New;
var
x,y: integer;
const
kaylee=9466755; //Kaylee’s purple top

procedure buy;
begin
wait(1000);
if(findcolor(x,y,kaylee,0,0,509,337))then;
clickmouse(x,y,true);
wait(2000+random(2000));
ClickMouse(318,451, true);
wait(3000);
ClickMouse(228,447, true);
wait(3000);
ClickMouse(228,447, true);
wait(3000);
ClickMouse(294,427, true);
wait(3000);
ClickMouse(227,448, true);
wait(3000);
ClickMouse(227,448, true);
wait(3000);
end;

begin
repeat
buy
until(false)
end.[/code]

Read full topic
